§ 44101. Application This chapter applies to a vessel that—(1) has berth or stateroom accommodations for at least 50 passengers; and
(2) boards passengers at a port in the United States.
(Pub. L. 109–304, § 7, Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1554.)
